summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Iteration 12 features. All 14 backend tests passed. All frontend features verified working correctly including OhCampus logo, established year display, Highlights/What's New tabs, Course Details modal with colorful styling, Compare Colleges with all required fields, and Admin Dashboard with statistics and Courses Needing Attention section.
passed_tests: Backend: API root accessible (200 OK)
Backend: Counselor login works (200 OK)
Backend: Admin login works (200 OK)
Backend: GET /api/colleges returns list with required fields (200 OK)
Backend: Colleges have established_year field
Backend: GET /api/colleges/{id} returns highlights, whats_new, placements
Backend: GET /api/courses returns paginated list (200 OK)
Backend: GET /api/courses/{id} returns description, eligibility, scope, job_profiles
Backend: GET /api/filters returns states and cities (200 OK)
Backend: GET /api/filters/course-levels returns levels (200 OK)
Backend: GET /api/courses/categories/list returns categories (200 OK)
Backend: GET /api/colleges/compare returns established_year, highlights, placements (200 OK)
Backend: Admin can access colleges, courses, fees, faqs (200 OK)
Backend: Courses with Closing/Under Waiting status identified
Frontend: Login page displays OhCampus logo correctly
Frontend: Navbar displays OhCampus logo correctly
Frontend: Dashboard shows established year for each college
Frontend: College Detail page shows established year in hero section (Est. 1994)
Frontend: College Detail page Highlights tab shows numbered highlights
Frontend: College Detail page What's New tab shows updates
Frontend: College Detail page Placements tab shows statistics with Year, Highest Package, Average Package, Placement Rate, Total Offers, Top Recruiters
Frontend: Courses page State filter populated (3 options)
Frontend: Courses page City filter populated (4 options)
Frontend: Course Details modal shows Description with blue gradient
Frontend: Course Details modal shows Eligibility with green gradient
Frontend: Course Details modal shows Scope with purple gradient
Frontend: Course Details modal shows Job Profiles as colorful badges
Frontend: Compare Colleges shows Established Year row (1994, 1973)
Frontend: Compare Colleges shows Highlights row with numbered items
Frontend: Compare Colleges shows Placements row
Frontend: Admin Dashboard shows 4 statistics cards (8 Colleges, 22 Courses, 24 Fees, 7 FAQs)
Frontend: Admin Dashboard shows Courses Needing Attention section (5 courses)
Frontend: Admin Dashboard shows Seat Availability Overview (14 Available, 3 Closing, 2 Under Waiting, 3 Closed)
seed_data_creation: Using existing MongoDB seed data with 8 colleges, 22 courses, 24 fee records, 7 FAQs
context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 12 features fully tested and working. Key verified features: 1) OhCampus logo displays correctly on Login page and Navbar (src: https://ohcampus.com/assets/images/logo/ohCampusLogo.png). 2) Colleges page shows established year for each college. 3) College Detail page has Highlights tab with numbered items, What's New tab with updates, Placements tab with statistics table. 4) Courses page has working State and City filters. 5) Course Details modal shows Description, Eligibility, Scope, Job Profiles with colorful gradient backgrounds. 6) Compare Colleges shows Established Year, Highlights, and Placements rows. 7) Admin Dashboard shows statistics (8 colleges, 22 courses, 24 fees, 7 FAQs) and Courses Needing Attention section with 5 courses having Closing/Under Waiting status.

details: Login page: OhCampus logo displayed at top
Navbar: OhCampus logo displayed in header
Logo source: https://ohcampus.com/assets/images/logo/ohCampusLogo.png
Dashboard college cards show 'Established' field (1994, 1973, 2010, 1985, 1953, 2012)
College Detail hero section shows 'Est. 1994'
Compare Colleges shows 'Established' row with years
Highlights tab: Shows numbered list of college highlights
What's New tab: Shows recent updates (AI & Data Analytics, Microsoft partnership, etc.)
Placements tab: Shows statistics table with Year, Highest Package, Average Package, Placement Rate, Total Offers, Top Recruiters
State filter: Populated with 3 options
City filter: Populated with 4 options
Filters are functional and update course list
Description: Blue gradient background, formatted text
Eligibility: Green gradient background, formatted text
Scope & Career: Purple gradient background, formatted text
Job Profiles: Orange gradient background, displayed as colorful badges (Business Analyst, Marketing Manager, etc.)
No raw HTML visible - all content properly styled
Established row: Shows year for each college (1994, 1973)
Highlights row: Shows numbered highlights for each college
Placements row: Present (shows 'â€”' when no data)
Also shows: Address, Category, Courses, Fee Range, Admission Charges
Statistics cards: 8 Featured Colleges, 22 Total Courses, 24 Fee Records, 7 FAQs
Courses Needing Attention: Shows 5 courses with Closing/Under Waiting status
Seat Availability Overview: 14 Available, 3 Closing, 2 Under Waiting, 3 Closed
